name: Saxon Advisors
description:
Saxon Advisors is a London-based corporate finance boutique that specialises in blockchain and digital assets.

We help fast-growing digital asset businesses to raise capital from institutional investors.

jobs.title: Marketing Intern
jobs.description:
As a Marketing Intern at Saxon Advisors, you will get a foot in the door to the exciting world of corporate finance and cryptocurrencies.

By working alongside the company's management, you will have the opportunity to understand how some of world's leading cryptocurrency businesses operate and raise capital.

### What You Will Bring to Saxon Advisors

- Foundational knowledge about cryptocurrencies and blockchains

- An interest in online and digital marketing

- Experience using Twitter and LinkedIn

- A desire to learn and be moulded

- Results-driven, detail-oriented, organised and a self-starter

### What You Will Work On

- Creating social media posts on LinkedIn and Twitter

- Compiling a monthly newsletter

- Contacting new affiliate partners and media publications

### Daily Responsibilities

- Responding to team requests

- Attending a daily update call

- Maintaining the client database

### Compensation and Duration

Saxon Advisors is offering a three month internship. 

You will eligible for a discretionary bonus at the end of each month and receive no fixed salary.

Depending on your success in the role, a paid permanent position may be offered at the end of the internship.

### How to Apply

To apply, please submit a short cover letter and CV to careers@saxonadvisors.com.
